name: Dungpler
description:
Made for the #7DBL Game Jam 

Crush annoying flies and killer ants while you roll up the droppings of the plains. Beware the mighty Bin Chicken, whom soars overhead. Deposit your bounty in a safe hole, and start again.

Controls:

- WASD / Arrows: to move your beetle around.
- R: restart the game.

Creators:

Samson Starmer-Lee  @itisSamson - Code and Design 

Ashleigh Starmer-Lee @catshriek - Art

Roll up poops and dunk 'em in the hole!
